testrunreport:convert.description: Convert test results to report type

inputdir.name: inputdir
inputdir.description: the directory to scan for reports

sourcedir.name: sourcedir
sourcedir.description: the directory to scan for reports

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: the directory to scan for reports

reporttype.name: reporttype
reporttype.description: type of report to convert to [sonarqube*]

testrunreport:retrieve.description: Retrieve reports for a test run
examples:
$ sfdx testrunreport:retrieve --targetusername myOrg@example.com --outputDirectory results
  Test results written to results/myOrg@example.com/2019-03-06T09:45:21.000+0000

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

outputdirectory.name: outputdirectory
outputdirectory.description: directory root to place test results

codecoverage.name: codecoverage
codecoverage.description: directory root to place test results

alltestsonly.name: alltestsonly
alltestsonly.description: only retrieve results for full test runs

resultformat.name: resultformat
resultformat.description: test result format emitted to stdout; --json flag overrides this parameter (human*,tap,junit,json)

inputdir.name: inputdir
inputdir.description: the directory to scan for reports
